source.77e25bac:
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
source.d1ec57c1:
plt.figure(figsize=(15,6))
plt.plot(x, p, label="R-bar",marker="o")
plt.plot(x, y,label="R-values" ,marker="o", linewidth=1, color="black")
plt.plot(x, z, label="UCL", linewidth=3,marker="o")
plt.plot(x, u, label="LCL",  linewidth=3,marker="o")
plt.grid(b=True, which="both")
plt.legend(loc="upper right")
#plt.ylim([-0.001,0.0028])
plt.title("R-Chart", fontsize=40)
plt.xlabel("Subgroup Number", fontsize=20)
plt.ylabel("R-values", fontsize=20)

plt.ylim(ymin=-0.00001,ymax=0.0028)
#plt.axis("off")
plt.show()
source.629f57e4:
plt.figure(figsize=(15,10))
plt.plot(x, p,label="X-bar" ,marker="*", color="black")
plt.plot(x, y,label="Control Line" ,marker="o")
plt.plot(x, z, label="UCL", linewidth=3,marker="o")
plt.plot(x, u, label="LCL",  linewidth=3,marker="o")
plt.grid(b=True, which="both")
plt.legend(loc="upper left")
#plt.ylim([0.800,0.824])
plt.title("Sloping Control Chart", fontsize=20)
#plt.ylim(ymin=-0.001,ymax=0.0028)
#plt.axis("off")
plt.xlabel("Subgroup Number", fontsize=20)
plt.ylabel("X-bar", fontsize=20)

plt.show()

source.86b9926c:
plt.figure(figsize=(15,10))
#plt.subplot(2,1,1)
plt.plot(x, p,label="U" ,marker="*", color="black")
plt.plot(x, u,label="Control Line" ,marker="o")
plt.plot(x, z, label="UCL", linewidth=3,marker="o")
plt.plot(x, y, label="LCL",  linewidth=3,marker="o")
plt.grid(b=True, which="both")
plt.legend(loc="upper left")
#plt.ylim([0.800,0.824])
#plt.ylim(ymin=47,ymax=53)
#plt.axis("off")
plt.xlabel("Week", fontsize=20,fontweight='bold')
plt.title("Fig-1:Control Chart ", fontsize=20,fontweight='bold')
plt.ylabel("p in %", fontsize=20,fontweight='bold')
#plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.show()

plt.plot(x, p,label="U" ,marker="*", color="black")
plt.plot(x, u,label="Control Line" ,marker="o")
plt.plot(x, z, label="UCL", linewidth=3,marker="o")
plt.plot(x, y, label="LCL",  linewidth=3,marker="o")
plt.grid(b=True, which="both")
plt.legend(loc="upper left")
#plt.ylim([0.800,0.824])
#plt.ylim(ymin=47,ymax=53)
#plt.axis("off")
#ax = plt.axes()
  
# Setting the background color of the plot 
# using set_facecolor() method
#ax.set_facecolor("black")
  
plt.xlabel("Day", fontsize=20,fontweight='bold')
plt.title("Fig-3:Nonconformities per unit control chart with variable sample size ", fontsize=20,fontweight='bold')
plt.ylabel("Nonconformities per roll of paper,U ", fontsize=20,fontweight='bold')
#plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.show()
